comment: Cannot believe this is still going on I did watch Savannah Gunthrie’s interview. With Amber,Iam lying written all over her face!
commentable_entity.title: Ignore Amber's interviews
commentable_entity.description: Following the outcome of the recent Johnny Depp vs. Amber Heard defamation trial, Amber is on a media tour rambling on incessantly continuing with her lies and risking further defaming Johnny Depp. We want it stopped. Nobody is going to watch her interviews so if you're paying her you're wasting your money and if you're not paying her you're losing viewers anyway one way or the other you need to stop allowing her to have your television time as her platform to further defame Johnny Depp. Every word out of her mouth is a lie. Stop giving her a platform! I'm speaking as a DV Survivor from 12 Years of horrific abuse that left me permanently scarred inside and out. Just seeing her triggers me I'm loaded with PTSD and I can't stand listening to her anymore and I am not the only one. Check Twitter check change.org for the petition to remove her from the Aquaman 2 movie. As of this morning it had 4.6 million signatures and they still have her in the movie. Do the right thing media stop interviewing her
commentable_entity.letter_body: Ignore the mainstream media interviews of Amber Heard.

comment: A Jury found Amber Heard to have defamed Johnny Depp on all 3 counts regarding sexual assault and domestic violence, and yet main stream media continues to give her a platform even though real life survivors of DV such as myself fully agree with the Jury and majority of the world in this case and we are mentally anguished and repeatedly triggered by being forced to hear about the mess Heard made for herself via her web of lies, deceit, extortion, and domestic abuse. Amber Heard IS the abuser, she perjured herself many times over and she deserves prison time for those reasons alone, and additionally for continuing to gaslight the world. Johnny Depp is her victim, start treating him as one and put a stop to Heard’s continued abuses and abhorrent behaviors.

comment: I created this petition because every media Outlet seems to want to interview this lunatic. Let's put a stop to it because I know they're paying her and even if they're not they're still giving her a platform. We can boycott and media Outlets who are interviewing her and shoot the ratings into the toilet. I'm not at all interested in her interview with Savannah Guthrie or anybody else. Come on everybody sign it share it keep it going I did not post a picture because I did not have one of her. And I did not want to disrespect Johnny Depp by post a picture of him associated with anything about her. He's had quite enough of her and quite frankly so have I and millions like me. Help me out friends let's get it going. Thank you please don't watch her interviews. But let's get this petition around and get the attention of MSM. They are no different than Warner Brothers. Let's get them!
